description: Analysis of biomarker testing rates and patterns in CRC patients
summary: Biomarker testing for CRC patients is inconsistent, with only 65% of eligible patients receiving complete panel testing.

charts.title: CRC Biomarker Testing Compliance by Provider

recommendations: Standardize CRC biomarker testing protocols across all practice sites
Implement automatic order sets for newly diagnosed CRC patients
Establish quality metrics for biomarker testing turnaround times
